sentences:
The Prinzenpalais is a palace , now used as an art museum , in the city of Oldenburg , Lower Saxony , Germany .
The museum houses the modern art collection of the State Museum for Art and Cultural History .
The building dates from 1826 and is in the classical style .
It was the residence of the Russian princes Alexander and Peter .
Subsequently Grand Duke Niklaus Friedrich Peter occupied the building .
In 2003 , it became part of the State Museum of Art and Cultural History ( with the Augusteum and Schloss Oldenburg ) and is an art gallery .
The museum concentrates on German artists , ranging from neoclassicism and Romanticism in the mid-19th century to the post-1945 era .
The Prinzenpalais building is near the northeast corner of the Schlossgarten Oldenburg .
The Augusteum , Elisabeth - Anna - Palais , and Schloss Oldenburg are all close to the museum .
